meanings.definition: A person with a stocky build and a tendency to gain weight easily.
meanings.sent1: My uncle is a pyknics, always struggling to keep his weight in check.
meanings.sent2: The pyknics at the gym have been working hard to improve their fitness levels.
meanings.sent3: Despite being a pyknics, he still manages to out-eat everyone at the buffet.
meanings.sent4: Her pyknics frame made her a natural choice for the role of a jolly chef in the play.
meanings.sent5: The little boy with pyknics features stood out among his slender classmates.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a body type characterized by a stocky build and a tendency to gain weight easily.
meanings.sent1: She admired the pyknics physique of the weightlifter at the competition.
meanings.sent2: The pyknics clothing line was designed to cater to individuals with a fuller figure.
meanings.sent3: The pyknics pug waddled around the room, looking for treats to snack on.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a pyknics appearance, with its sturdy walls and small windows.
meanings.sent5: The pyknics nature of the breed made them excellent companions for cold winters.
